attributes.title: THIS APP IS THE WORST NEVER GET THIS APP!!!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This app is so bad that It Made my fish drown when i Saw the first Photo So then I went to pet smart on my Pet Turtle and then They wanted me to wear a mask so I Rode my turtle back home and it died the halfway there so then I walked R.I.P bubbles And then My door was gone right when I opened the app and then I left my house and I came back with a new fish and a huge wall was on top of my house so If you get this app you will get the Trump infection SO DONT GET IT THIS APP IS BAD.

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: Trying to take away fun from innocent kids who haven’t done anything bad is disgusting just because you don’t know how to do the renegade doesn’t mean you can take it away from us old man so please just don’t make any more effort in taking away something from people that never did anything to you just please stop ✨oH tO SeE WIThOuT mY EyEs✨😌 thank you for your time 🇲🇽💯

attributes.title: disgusting
attributes.review: i hate it here it’s disgusting i cannot believe my eyes👁👄👁 had to see this monstrosity of an app. i didn’t know what was gonna show up as soon as i opened it. first i saw a terrifying imagine of an orange man it’s been a couple of days since i downloaded it but i’ve been having nightmares of him and i wake up crying bc i hate it here. then it asks me for my number which is already kinda sketchy because why are they asking for my number ? are they trying to take away my privacy? we have no idea what they are going to do with our numbers as soon as they collect it and we must do something about it. now repeat, i ! hate ! it ! here !

attributes.title: The worst app ever created
attributes.review: I don’t even know why he made this but it’s the worst he want to delete TikTok he need to delete this with he’s orange head he wearing a wig but anyways this app made me waste my time like literally it was making me throw up 🤢🤮👿 he needs professional help bc he wanna delete TikTok he need too delete this app and why is he still in the White House he belongs in jail a casket and the streets like that’s on wat that’s on PERIODT

attributes.title: made me sick!!!
attributes.review: I opened the app and the first thing I see is the orange Cheeto 🤢 I immediately felt nauseous but I was too far from the bathroom so I ended up throwing up on the living room carpet. Before I could do anything about it, my cat started licking the vomit. Seeing her do that made me even more sick so we were stuck in this vicious vomiting cycle for several minutes. I do not recommend this experience

attributes.title: my family is in danger
attributes.review: ever since i downloaded this app my family has been possessed. my 17 children wont stop eating Cheetos and i am concerned for their health and safety. i think it is connected to the Cheeto on the sign up page in the app...very scary😳🚨now i have 18 exorcisms lined up and scheduled for my family and that costs a LOT. i do not recommend this app AT ALL. if you care about your family, DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!🚨🚨🚨🚨

attributes.title: This app...has 0 BODIESSS
attributes.review: First off when I open this app all I see this this orange ugly thing😔and I will be scarred for the rest of my life, plus the quality and designers of this app did a BAD JOBBBBB this should be taken down RIGHT NOWWW IMMEDIATELY‼️Before I turn into a Karen and call the manager✨I have been put down that our president can produce the this much TRASH this is absolutely unacceptable‼️ and I demand you to take this app down, ty✨🧚🏽

attributes.title: Worse app ever
attributes.review: It’s very slow one time it took 3 whole hours just to load I always have to  it download it again beacause it’s messy my device up and makes it very slow pls take this app of the App Store even really old versions of games work faster then this and every tim I download it it messes with my internet and I have to reset my internet pls get rid of this app for good

attributes.title: Smelly cheeto🤢😒
attributes.review: So I opened the app and mind you it was barely 3 am and then the app started blasting Pumped up kicks the song on full volume. When I set everything up this Orange Cheeto kept on asking me to lick his Cheeto dust🤢. I then tried to close the app but then kept being put back into the app even when I shut off my phone multiple times. Overall horrible app do not recommend😑.
